ref.mixed-citation: Smith JB, Schellnhuber HJ, Mirza MMQ. Vulnerability to climate change and reasons for concern: a synthesis. In: McCarthy JJ, Canziani OF, Leary NA, Dokken DJ, White KS, editors. UK: Cambridge University Press; 2001.
